attributes.action: to stop the culling of deaf dalmatians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 8% of dalamtians are born compleatly deaf and up to 22 % are deaf in one ear. these myths are perpetuated by many breeders their parents clubs and registries vetinarians trainers and other so called experts. the vast majority have never allowed a deaf dog to live long enough to actually discover if there beliefs have any real merit
